Title Format: Product Name - Tagline or Value Prop
Meta Description: 150-160 chars describing product value. Include primary keyword. End with CTA phrase.
Schema Type: Organization + Product. Optional: FAQPage if FAQ section exists. SoftwareApplication for SaaS.
Open Graph: og:type=website, og:image=1200x630 hero image, og:title=same as title, og:description=same as meta
Heading Structure: H1: Main headline (1 only). H2: Section titles (Features, Pricing, FAQ). H3: Feature names, FAQ questions.
Internal Link Strategy: Link to all main pages from nav (Pricing, Features, About, Blog). Footer links to legal pages. CTA links to Sign Up.

Title Format: Sign Up - Product Name OR Create Account - Product Name
Meta Description: Join Product Name today. Create your free account in seconds. Brief value prop.
Schema Type: No schema needed. Optional: Organization on all pages.
Indexing: noindex follow (prevent duplicate with landing CTA) OR index follow if SEO-targeted
Open Graph: og:type=website, og:title=Sign Up, og:image=product screenshot or logo
Heading Structure: H1: Create your account OR Sign up for Product. No other major headings needed.
Internal Link Strategy: Link to Sign In, Terms, Privacy Policy. After signup redirect to dashboard/onboarding.

Title Format: Sign In - Product Name OR Log In - Product Name
Meta Description: Sign in to your Product Name account. Access your dashboard and manage your projects.
Indexing: noindex follow (prevent indexing login pages) OR index follow
Heading Structure: H1: Sign in to your account OR Welcome back. Minimal heading structure.
Internal Link Strategy: Link to Sign Up, Forgot Password. After login redirect to dashboard.

Meta Description: Not needed (noindex page). If indexed: Manage your projects and view analytics on Product Name.
Heading Structure: H1: Dashboard or Welcome back [Name]. H2: Section titles (Recent Activity, Stats, Quick Actions).
Internal Link Strategy: Nav links to all app sections (Settings, Profile, specific features). User menu → logout.

Heading Structure: H1: Admin Dashboard. H2: Section titles (Users, Content, Analytics, Settings).
Internal Link Strategy: Sidebar nav to all admin sections. Breadcrumbs for nested admin pages.

Title Format: Settings - Product Name OR Account Settings - Product Name
Meta Description: Not needed (noindex page). If indexed: Manage your account settings, profile, and preferences.
Heading Structure: H1: Settings or Account Settings. H2: Sections (Profile, Security, Notifications, Billing).
Internal Link Strategy: Sub-nav between settings sections. Back to dashboard link.

Title Format: Pricing - Product Name OR Product Name Pricing & Plans
Meta Description: Compare Product Name plans and pricing. Start free or choose Pro for advanced features. Money-back guarantee.
Schema Type: Product with Offer for each plan. Optional: FAQPage for pricing FAQ section.
Open Graph: og:type=website, og:image=pricing comparison graphic or product screenshot
Heading Structure: H1: Simple transparent pricing OR Choose your plan. H2: Plan names. H3: Feature categories in comparison.
Internal Link Strategy: Each plan CTA → Sign Up with plan pre-selected. FAQ links to relevant feature pages. Compare link to features page.

Title Format: Blog - Product Name OR Product Name Blog - Topic
Meta Description: Read the latest articles about [topic] on the Product Name blog. Tips, tutorials, and industry insights.
Canonical: Canonical to /blog. Pagination: rel=next/prev, canonical to page 1 for page 1.
Open Graph: og:type=website, og:image=featured post image or blog header
Heading Structure: H1: Blog or Latest Articles. H2: Featured post title. H3: Individual post titles in list.
Internal Link Strategy: Each post card → full post. Categories → filtered list. Newsletter signup CTA. Author → author page if exists.

Title Format: Post Title | Product Name Blog OR Post Title - Product Name
Meta Description: 150-160 chars summarizing the post. Include primary keyword naturally. Entice click from search results.
Schema Type: Article (required: headline, author, datePublished, dateModified, image, publisher). Optional: BreadcrumbList, FAQPage if post has FAQ.
Canonical: Canonical to /blog/post-slug. If syndicated, canonical to original.
Open Graph: og:type=article, og:image=post featured image (1200x630), article:published_time, article:author, article:tag
Heading Structure: H1: Post title (exactly 1). H2: Major sections. H3: Subsections. Never skip heading levels.
Internal Link Strategy: Related posts at bottom → other articles. Breadcrumbs → Blog List → Category. Internal links within content to other posts/pages. Author → author page.

Meta Description: Product description in 150-160 chars. Include key features, price range. End with availability or CTA.
Schema Type: Product (required: name, image, description, offers with price/currency/availability). Optional: AggregateRating, Review, BreadcrumbList.
Canonical: Canonical to /products/product-slug. If variants, canonical to main product.
Open Graph: og:type=product, og:image=primary product image, product:price:amount, product:price:currency
Heading Structure: H1: Product name. H2: Description, Reviews, Related Products. H3: Feature details, individual reviews.
Internal Link Strategy: Breadcrumbs → Category → Product. Related products → other PDPs. Add to Cart → Cart. Reviews anchor link from rating summary.

Meta Description: Not recommended for meta description (dynamic content).
Indexing: noindex follow (prevent thin content indexing of search result pages)
Canonical: Canonical to /search without query parameters OR no canonical
Heading Structure: H1: Search results for 'query'. H2: Filter categories if applicable.
Internal Link Strategy: Each result → detail page. No results → suggested categories/popular pages. Filters → refined search.

Meta Description: Not needed (noindex page). Brief: Complete your purchase securely on Product Name.
Heading Structure: H1: Checkout or Complete your order. H2: Shipping, Payment, Order Summary.
Internal Link Strategy: Back to Cart. Terms/Privacy links. Order confirmation → Thank you page.

Heading Structure: H1: Page not found or 404. H2: Suggestions or search.
Internal Link Strategy: Back to Home link. Search bar → Search Results. Suggested popular pages.

Title Format: Contact Us - Product Name OR Get in Touch - Product Name
Meta Description: Contact Product Name for questions, support, or partnerships. Email, phone, and contact form available.
Schema Type: ContactPage + LocalBusiness (if physical location). Include address, phone, email, openingHours.
Open Graph: og:type=website, og:image=office photo or map screenshot
Heading Structure: H1: Contact Us or Get in Touch. H2: Contact Form, Location, Office Hours.
Internal Link Strategy: FAQ link → FAQ page. Form submit → Thank you page. Social links → external profiles. Support → help docs.

Title Format: About Us - Product Name OR About Product Name
Meta Description: Learn about Product Name's mission, team, and story. Founded in [year], we help [audience] achieve [goal].
Schema Type: AboutPage + Organization (name, url, logo, founders, foundingDate). Optional: Person for team members.
Heading Structure: H1: About Product Name or Our Story. H2: Mission, Team, Values, Timeline. H3: Individual team members.
Internal Link Strategy: CTA → Contact or Careers. Team → individual profiles. Footer → all main sections. Timeline → key milestones.
